title: Highest Fossil Fuel Dependency
description: In 2022, Azerbaijan's energy consumption was entirely reliant on fossil fuels, making up 100% of the total energy usage. This highlights the country's significant dependency on non-renewable energy sources.

title: Limited Social Insurance Adequacy
description: As of 2015, only 24.26% of the total welfare of beneficiary households in Azerbaijan was covered by social insurance programs, indicating a gap in social safety nets.

title: Significant Support to Poorest Quintile
description: In 2015, 15.92% of Azerbaijan's social insurance benefits were directed towards the poorest quintile, showcasing a targeted approach to aid the most vulnerable.

title: Lowest Female Tobacco Use
description: Azerbaijan reported a remarkably low prevalence of tobacco use among female adults, with only 0.1% of females using tobacco in 2022, reflecting positive public health outcomes.
